alert.note: Alert for Coastal Citrus; Coastal Hernando; Coastal Levy; Inland Citrus; Inland Levy; Sumter (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 19 at 2:27PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Citrus, northern Sumter and southeastern Levy Counties through 315 PM EDT... At 227 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 12 miles southwest of Bronson to near Inverness Highlands North to near Bushnell. Movement was south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Inverness, Wildwood, Homosassa Springs, Beverly Hills, Inverness Airport, Crystal River Airport, Black Diamond, Homosassa, Inverness Highlands South, Inverness Highlands North, Hernando, Sugarmill Woods, Lake Panasoffkee, Inglis, Coleman, Otter Creek, Arbor Lakes, Lecanto, Citronelle and Leisure Acres. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Citrus; Coastal Hernando; Coastal Levy; Inland Citrus; Inland Levy; Sumter
